overview.title: Haridwar (…Gateway to Heaven):
overview.subtitle: Haridwar is one of the seven sacred cities of the Hindus and is a major pilgrimage center. It has been known by many names originally it was called Kapila’ for the sage who once lived there. Its present name means 'Door to Hari' Hari is one of the names of Lord Vishnu’ a principal deity of Hindusim.

overview.title: Rishikesh (…The City of Nirvana):
overview.subtitle: Located in the foothills of Himalayas along the convergence of Ganga and Chanderbhaga river, Rishikesh is known for its adventure activities, ancient temples, popular cafes and as the 'Yoga Capital of the World'. With whitewater rafting industry growing and varied camping and café sports springing up, Rishikesh has grown immensely as a favourite, catering to people with different needs.

description.title: Day 1 Pickup from Delhi Railway Station / Airport (210 Kms : 6Hrs. Travelling to Haridwar)

subtitles.activities: Arrival in Haridwar and enjoy a quick and hassle-free check-in at Hotel.
Haridwar local Sightseeing such as Chandi Devi, Mansa Devi, Moti Bazar, Holy bath at Ganga and evening Aarti at Har-ki-Puri.
Haridwar local Sightseeing such as Daksha Parjapati, Jai Ram Ashram, Anand Mai Maa, Bharata Mata Temple, Bharat Darshan, Pawan Dham, Bhuma Niketan, Shanti Kunj, Ram Temple etc.

description.title: Day 3 Haridwar to Rishikesh (24 Kms : 1Hr. Travelling to Rishikesh)

subtitles.activities: Rishikesh local Sightseeing Bharat Mandir, Omkaranand Ashram, Tirvani Ghat along with the evening Aarti.
Rishikesh local Sightseeing such as Ram Jhula, Laxman Jhula, Geeta Mandir, Parmarth Niktan along with the evening Aarti.

description.title: Day 5 Rishikesh to Delhi (240 Kms : 7Hrs. Travelling to Delhi)

subtitles.activities: Reaching at Airport by having Sweet Memoires in mind and lots of love.

importantInfo.title: Note
subtitles: Vehicles are not allowed on the Mall road of Nainital and Mussoorie so you have to travel by foot there.
AC and Music System in Vehicle will not be operated when we are on the Hilly Area.
All the rates are subject to change without prior notice.
All disputes are subject to Haridwar Jurisdiction.
Govt. Taxes (GST)

cancellationPolicy.title: Cancellation Policy:
subtitles: 10% of the Total Package Cost is Non-Refundable.
25% cancellation charge of the total package cost, if cancellation less than 30 days before arrival.
35% cancellation charge of the total package cost, if cancellation between 15 to 7 days before arrival.
50% cancellation charge of the total package cost if cancellation between 7 to 2 days before arrival.
100% cancellation charge of the total package cost if cancellation before 48 Hrs. before arrival.
Altering the confirmed plan Not possible.
